scripts.build:client: rm -rf client/.env && cp .env client/.env && cd client/ && yarn build && cd ../
scripts.all: yarn build:client && yarn build:server && yarn build:types && yarn build && yarn up
scripts.install: cd types/ && yarn && yarn build && yarn link && cd ../server/ && yarn && yarn link 'wasyway-types' && cd ../client/ && yarn && yarn link 'wasyway-types' && cd .. && yarn all
